bug.author: fathow666666
bug.summary: infer shaped for node: MobilenetV1/MobilenetV1/Conv2d_0/Conv2D-MobilenetV1/MobilenetV1/Conv2d_0/BatchNorm/FusedBatchNorm-MobilenetV1/MobilenetV1/Conv2d_0/Relu6 op: Convolution failed
bug.description:
First i use the mobilent model in Tengine model zoo,it is able to run. Then I use the convert tool change tensorflow model to tengine model. When use the mobilentv1.tmfile to classifay ,i says the error that infer shaped for node: MobilenetV1/MobilenetV1/Conv2d_0/Conv2D-MobilenetV1/MobilenetV1/Conv2d_0/BatchNorm/FusedBatchNorm-MobilenetV1/MobilenetV1/Conv2d_0/Relu6 op: Convolution failed Prerun graph failed <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63153189/78452125-09e2a900-76bc-11ea-8eb3-9945dde2d68a.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63153189/78452127-0cdd9980-76bc-11ea-9f57-be9f8dd49c68.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63153189/78452130-0fd88a00-76bc-11ea-97f8-b9b317a47dbb.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: May you can try compare the differences between the two modelsï¼Ÿ through Netron tools . I will take a look at this problem .

The input tensor shape of tensorflow model is [?,224,224,3],it means NHWC, but in the test code ,the definition of input tensor shape is [1,3,224,224], it means NCHW , you need change the test code.And try it again.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/fathow666666>@fathow666666</denchmark-link>
  the tensorflow model format is NHWC , but in our code default is nchw ,so you can modify like this :
'''
--- a/examples/classification.cpp
+++ b/examples/classification.cpp
@@ -67,7 +67,7 @@ bool run_tengine_library(const char* model_name, const char* tm_file, const char
// set input
int img_size = img_h * img_w * 3;

int dims[] = {1, 3, img_h, img_w};


int dims[] = {1, img_h, img_w ,3 };
'''
